scripts.dev:vue-ts: cd examples/vue-ts && rm node_modules -fr; yarn; yarn dev;
scripts.clear: rm -fr telos-cloud/dist; rm -fr telos-cloud/node_modules; rm -fr examples/*/node_modules
scripts.dev: nodemon --watch telos-cloud/src --ext ts,js,json --exec "yarn build-telos-cloud && yarn dev:vue-ts"
scripts.publish-on-npm: cd telos-cloud && yarn build && npm publish
